mapper.select: {#{resultCode, mode=OUT, javaType=int, jdbcType=NUMERIC} = call COMP.Z$RUNTIME_SZ_UTL.getAccAttrs( #{pDistrName, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pOrgCode, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pStSortName, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pStreetName, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pHouseNum, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pHousePart, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pFlatNum, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date, mode=IN, javaType=date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{details, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, resultMap=accountDetailMap}) }

{#{resultCode, mode=OUT, javaType=int, jdbcType=NUMERIC} = call COMP.Z$RUNTIME_SZ_UTL.GetAttrsByAccCode( #{pDistrName, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pOrgCode, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pAccCode, mode=IN, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pAccCodeType, mode=IN, javaType=int, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date, mode=IN, javaType=date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{details, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, resultMap=accountDetailResultMap}) }

mapper.insert:
insert into COMP.Z#K_PRIV_REC ( ID, COLLECTION_ID, C_COD, C_INDEX, C_KODUL, C_KAT, C_LGCODE, C_STATUS, C_CDPR, C_NCARD, C_IDPIL, C_DATEIN, C_DATEOUT, C_PASPPIL, C_FIOPIL, C_HOUSE, C_BUILD, C_APT, C_RAH ) values
( COMP.SEQ_ID.NEXTVAL, #{p.dbfFields.COLLECTION_ID}, #{p.dbfFields.COD}, #{p.dbfFields.INDEX}, #{p.dbfFields.CDUL}, #{p.dbfFields.KAT}, #{p.dbfFields.LGCODE}, 0, #{p.dbfFields.CDPR}, #{p.dbfFields.NCARD}, #{p.dbfFields.IDPIL}, #{p.dbfFields.DATEIN}, #{p.dbfFields.DATEOUT}, #{p.dbfFields.PASPPIL}, #{p.dbfFields.FIOPIL}, #{p.dbfFields.HOUSE}, #{p.dbfFields.BUILD}, #{p.dbfFields.APT}, #{p.accountNumber} )

insert into COMP.Z#BUFF_SUBS ( ID, COLLECTION_ID, C_LAST_NAME, C_FIRST_NAME, C_MIDDLE_NAME, C_DISTRICT, C_STREET, C_HOUSE, C_FLAT, C_STATUS, C_ACC_CODE, C_PART, C_EXT_STREET_NAME, C_EXT_ID, C_EXT_STREET_SORT, C_DATE_B, C_DATE_E, C_SUMMA, C_SUBS, C_NM_PAY, C_OBS, C_NUMM ) values ( COMP.SEQ_ID.NEXTVAL, #{dbfFields.COLLECTION_ID}, #{lastName}, #{firstName}, #{middleName}, #{dbfFields.ID_RAJ}, #{dbfFields.VULCOD}, #{dbfFields.BLD_CYR}, #{dbfFields.FLAT_CYR}, 0, #{accountNumber}, #{dbfFields.CORP_CYR}, #{dbfFields.NAME_V_CYR}, #{dbfFields.NUMB}, #{dbfFields.CAT_V_CYR}, #{dbfFields.DAT1}, #{dbfFields.DAT2}, #{dbfFields.C_SUMMA}, #{dbfFields.C_SUBS}, #{dbfFields.C_NM_PAY}, #{dbfFields.C_OBS}, #{dbfFields.NUMM} )
